mapper.sql: ad_id, cname, display_position, lp_url, create_time, ads_start, ads_end, ads_time_start, ads_time_end, state, exposure, click_rate, img_url
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from t_advert
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into t_advert (ad_id, cname, display_position, lp_url, create_time, ads_start, ads_end, ads_time_start, ads_time_end, state, exposure, click_rate, img_url) values (#{adId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{displayPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lpUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{adsStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{adsEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{adsTimeStart,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adsTimeEnd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{exposure,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{clickRate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.select:
select from t_advert
ads_start <= #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, and ads_end >= #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, and ads_time_start <= #{hour,jdbcType=INTEGER}, and ads_time_end >= #{hour,jdbcType=INTEGER}, and displayPosition=#{display,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and state='0' limit 1

and state='0'
